mapper.select: SELECT ifnull(sum(money),0) from tab_tixian_log where (status1 = 2 or status1 = 6 or status1 = 9) and userid in (select rowid from tab_user_data where parentid = #{userId} or parentid1 = #{userId} )
SELECT count(*) from tab_tixian_log where ( status1 = 2 or status1 = 1 or status1 = 4 or status1 = 12 or status1 = 5 or status1 = 6 or status1 = 8 or status1 = 9) and userid = #{userid}
mapper.update: update tab_tixian_log set ygzh =#{ygzh} , ygzh2 =#{ygzh2} where userid =#{userid}
mapper.select: SELECT ifnull(sum(money),0 ) from tab_tixian_log where status1 = 2 and (parentid1 = #{rowid} or parentid2 = #{rowid} or parentid3 = #{rowid})
